# The `PolymorphicTraits` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class should be specialized by any type that can be represented as a scalar, map, or sequence, decided dynamically. <a href="#details">More...</a>

struct llvm::yaml::PolymorphicTraits&lt;T&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This class should be specialized by any type that can be represented as a scalar, map, or sequence, decided dynamically.

For example:

typedef std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;MyBase&gt; MyPoly;

template&lt;&gt; struct <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/yaml/polymorphictraits">PolymorphicTraits&lt;MyPoly&gt;</a> &#123; static <a href="/docs/api/structs/nodekind">NodeKind</a> getKind(const MyPoly &amp;poly) &#123; return poly-&gt;getKind(); &#125; static MyScalar&amp; getAsScalar(MyPoly &amp;poly) &#123; if (!poly || !isa&lt;MyScalar&gt;(poly)) poly.reset(new MyScalar()); return &#42;cast&lt;MyScalar&gt;(poly.get()); &#125; // ... &#125;;

Definition at line 300 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/yamltraits-h">YAMLTraits.h</a>.
